books.title: The Secret Diary of Adrian Mole Aged 13 3/4 : Adrian Mole Book 1
books.description: A satire of our times. Very funny indeed' Sunday Times. The Secret Diary of Adrian Mole Aged 13 3/4 is the first book in Sue Townsend's brilliantly funny Adrian Mole series.

books.title: Once
books.description: Once by Morris Gleitzman is the story of a young Jewish boy who is determined to escape the orphanage he lives in to save his Jewish parents from the Nazis in the occupied Poland of the Second World War.
